message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the enthusiasm, but $180 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. How about $140?
Hi Bob, I understand your concern about the price, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $160.
Alice, $160 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $150. Let's make this deal happen!
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm not willing to go down to $150 just yet. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $155.
